loans.name: Naira

texts.en:
Naira is a young, beautiful, clever and highly skilled dentist. She graduated from Yerevan State Medical University's Dental Department. She has had her own dental clinic for 18 years and a lot of loyal clients fully trust their dental health to Naira. Naira is married and she has three daughters. She lives in Kapan with her husband, children and parents-in-law, who are retired. 
In her clinic, over the years Naira has bought all needed modern equipment for her work. Now, Naira wants to renew all of it. With the help of her first Kiva loan, she seeks to buy an autoclave for medical tools sterilization. She could not find a better partner than Kiva to support her in business.

loans.use: to buy an autoclave for medical tools sterilization

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Please meet 46-year-old Martha from Buchanan. Buchanan is the capital city of Grand Bassa County and is located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 
Martha did not go to school. She is married. She describes herself as hardworking woman. She has nine children between 20 and 10. Her children are in school and live at home. 
Martha has a table which sells goods such as pepper, bitter ball (a tropical vegetable with a bitter taste), and okra.  She has been in business for 25 years and works every day, 10 hours each day. With this loan, she will buy goods such as pepper, bitter ball (a tropical vegetable with a bitter taste), and okra. One of the greatest challenges that she faces is increasing her sales. She transports her goods by taxi. She started her business with money from her husband. She is proud of her business because of the profit she makes. Her future plan is to build a house. She thanks you in advance for your support!

loans.use: to buy goods such as pepper, bitter ball (a tropical vegetable with a bitter taste), and okra.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Please meet 36-year-old Esther from Buchanan. Buchanan is the capital city of Grand Bassa County and is located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are speakers of Bassa, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 
Esther is a married college student. She describes herself as a hardworking woman. Her husband is a driver. She has three children between 11 and 6. They are in school and live at home. 
Esther has a shop which sells blouses, slippers, body cream, powder and earrings. She has been in business for 11 years and works every day, spending ten hours each day. With this loan, she will buy blouses, slippers, body cream, powder, and earrings. One of the greatest challenges that she faces is increasing her sales. She transports her goods by taxi. She started her business with money from her husband. She is proud of her business because of the profit she makes. Her future plan is to buy a car. She thanks you in advance for your support!

loans.use: to buy blouses, slippers, body cream, powder, and earrings.

loans.name: Asma

texts.en: Asma is a 33-year-old vigorous lady who has been stitching clothes for many years. She sews for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. However, due to lack of available funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. To help her continue operation of her business, she requested a loan of Rs.30000/- to buy threads in different colors along with packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of her revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy threads in different colors along with packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Simón

texts.es: Simón vive con su esposa y sus 8 hijos, que tienen edades entre 2 y 19 años. Se dedica a la agricultura en su pequeña finca, donde cultiva café y banano. Uno de sus objetivos es que sus hijos se eduquen y aprendan a leer y escribir. El café es el principal rubro que le permite obtener ingresos para su familia, por lo que ha decidido solicitar este crédito para comprar fertilizantes y otros insumos que le garanticen el mantenimiento de su cafetal en este año y contar con buenos rendimientos durante la próxima cosecha, para aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Simón lives with his wife and 8 children whose ages range between 2 and 19 years.   He works in agriculture on his small farm where he grows coffee and bananas.  One of his goals is that his children become educated and that they learn how to read and write.  Coffee is the main crop that allows him to earn family income which is why he’s decided to request this loan to buy fertilizer and other supplies that will guarantee coffee crop maintenance this year to produce good crop yields in the next harvest in order to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other supplies for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is 29 years old. She lives in Kapan with her mother, who is unemployed, and her brother. Anna has studied at the Kapan Economical College in the Financial-Economic department and for several years she has worked as an accountant. Besides that work, Anna and her mother are engaged in business activities. They have built a nice and colorful vegetable greenhouse where they cultivate beans, cucumber, parsley, radishes, onions and greens. They sell the harvest in Kapan's wholesale market.
Now Anna needs a loan of 600,000 Armenian drams to buy plastic sheeting, fertilizer, soil, pipes, and seedlings. Anna is sure that they will manage to enlarge their business in the future and build a bigger greenhouse near their house.

loans.use: to buy plastic sheeting, fertilizer, soil, pipes, and seedlings.

loans.name: Govi

texts.en:
Govi sells farming products from home to the general public. He faces a major challenge of seasonality in his business.

With the 25,000 KES loan, he wants to purchase more seed and fertilizer for farming to facilitate his activities and sales.
He decided to join Yehu to get financial assistance to improve his business and he appreciates the support.

loans.use: to purchase more seeds and fertilizer for farming to facilitate his activities and sales.

loans.name: Shamsa

texts.en: Shamsa has expertise in doing machine embroidery and is has used her skill to provide for her family for over five years now. During the initial years of her business, she barely made enough money to purchase the required material. Today she is proud to be famous in her community as the best at making beautiful patterns with thread and beads. Three years ago, when she borrowed from Kashf for the first time, she purchased spools of thread with some packs of beads and pearls. Now, she has requested another loan worth Rs. 40000 to purchase a new machine with more packs of threads and sequins in different colors. She says that the females in her community have become demanding over time and satisfying them is a challenge that Shamsa has taken up. She has four children, two in school. She wishes to provide them quality education for prosperous futures.

loans.use: to purchase a new machine with more packs of threads and sequins in different colors.

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia lives in a small town outside of Maphombe, in Kwale county. Kwale county is located on the Kenyan coast near the border of Tanzania. While beekeeping has not historically been a major activity in the region, the mangrove swamps closer to the coast and large passion fruit farms inland provide bees with robust sources of nectar. Though most farmers in the area are new to beekeeping, many are very enthusiastic about keeping bees. 

Julia is married and has five children. Both she and her husband farm and are currently growing mangoes and passion fruit on their land. She is excited to start beekeeping because her bees will pollinate her crops, thus increasing her income. 

This is Julia’s first loan, and she plans to use the income generated by her beehives to increase her passion fruit stands. In the future, her hope is to expand her apiary “to a commercial level.”

loans.use: to buy beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Juan es un pequeño productor de café integrado a las plataformas de negocios promovidas por la Asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria (PAC), y por tanto al proceso de certificación Comercio Justo que promueve esta asociación entre el grupo de productores que apoya con servicios financieros y de desarrollo empresarial. En su finca, Dn. Juan cultiva café, cacao y malanga coco, estas actividades las realiza con el apoyo de su esposa y sus 5 hijos. Además, genera en promedio 2 empleos en su comunidad.
El cuenta que una de las actividades que más le gusta hacer es cortar el café porque siente que está cosechando el trabajo que realiza en este cultivo. Para este ciclo, él necesita contar con recursos para garantizar el mantenimiento de su plantación de café, por lo tanto ha decidido solicitar este crédito para comprar parte de los insumos del mantenimiento de su cafetal. Su meta es incrementar el rendimiento y calidad de sus plantaciones y en un mediano plazo aumentar su área de café.
texts.en:
Juan is a small coffee grower who is part of the business platforms promoted by Asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria (PAC) and part of the Fair Commerce certification process as well that this association promotes among producers that it supports with financial services and business development.  Juan grows coffee, cocoa beans and malanga coco [tuber similar to a yam in appearance and a potato in flavor] on his farm; he does these activities with help from his wife and five children.  He also generates two job opportunities in his community on average.

He relates that one of the activities he likes best is cutting the coffee because he feels that he’s harvesting the fruits of his labor.  For this cycle, he needs to have resources available to guarantee the care of his coffee plants.  Because of this, he’s decided to request this loan to buy part of the supplies he needs to provide coffee crop maintenance.  His goal is to increase crop yields and quality of his plants and in the medium run increase the area planted with coffee.

loans.use: to buy supplies to apply to his coffee crop.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru: Гулсара молодая незамужняя девушка. Ей 29 лет. Она живет вместе с матерью, братьями и младшей сестрой в городе Куляб. Её братья находятся в России на заработках. Гулсара окончила школу и у нее среднее образование. Она предприимчивая и трудолюбивая девушка. Гулсара хочет начать бизнес в области торговли. Она накопила деньги и построила магазин рядом с домом. Гулсара берет кредит для закупа товаров, чтобы  заполнить витрины магазина продуктами питания. Она впервые занимается бизнесом, и в этом деле ей будет помогать младшая сестра.
texts.en: Gulsara is a young single woman.  She is 29 years old.  She lives together with her mother, brothers and a younger sister in the city of Kulob.  Her brothers are working in Russia.  Gulsara finished school and has a secondary education.  She is an entrepreneurial and hardworking young woman.  Gulsara wants to start a business in the retail field.  She saved money and built a store near her home.  Gulsara is requesting this loan to purchase merchandise in order to fill the store displays with food products.  This is her first time getting involved in business and her younger sister will be helping her with it.

loans.use: to purchase food products

loans.name: Lionel

texts.es: Lionel tiene 26 años, es soltero y vive en la casa de sus tíos. Lionel se dedica la compra y venta de ganado. Su amigo fue quien le enseño está actividad, pero cuando gano experiencia emprendió su propio negocio. Con sus ahorros pudo  comprarse un vehículo, y de ahí mejorar su negocio. Gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación pudo salir adelante y ahora tiene un negocio estable que le ayuda a mejorar su calidad de vida y apoyar a sus padres económicamente. Como un hombre emprendedor espera seguir creciendo y sacar adelante su actividad, aumentando su productividad y mejorando su trabajo. Este es su primer crédito con Kiva por lo que agradece el apoyo económico recibido y promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Con el monto de S/.1500.00 Lionel comprara ganado y elevará sus ventas.
texts.en:
Lionel, 26, lives in his aunt’s and uncle’s house.  He works buying and selling livestock.  His friend taught him this activity but when he got experience he started his own business.  He was able to buy a vehicle with his savings and thus improve his business.  Thanks to his effort and dedication he was able to get ahead and now has a stable business that helps him improve his quality of life and help his parents economically.

Like all enterprising men he hopes to continue growing and moving his activity forward increasing productivity and improving his work.  This is his first Kiva loan and he’s grateful for the economic support received; he promises to be punctual with his payments.  Lionel will use the requested 1,500 soles to buy livestock and he will increase his sales.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Herder

texts.es: Herder tiene 26 años, es soltero y vive en la casa de sus padres junto a su familia. Herder se dedica a la agricultura con su padre. Trabaja en los terrenos de cultivo pero también vende sus productos en la ciudad. Como una actividad complementaria, Herder también es trabajador de la Municipalidad, y trabaja de peón buscando incrementar sus ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Aunque algunos años han sido difíciles ya que no había mucha productividad en sus terrenos pero  gracias al apoyo de su familia a seguido adelante. También tiene un  negocio en donde se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, ahora con los ingresos extras de sus actividades espera seguir creciendo y sacar adelante a toda su familia. Para Herder este es el primer crédito con Kiva, por lo que agradece el apoyo económico recibido y promete ser puntual con sus pagos, para más adelante solicitar otro préstamo. El dinero solicitado de S/.800.00 lo invertirá en la compra de abono orgánico para sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Herder, 26, is single living with his family in his parents’ house.  Herder works in agriculture with his father.  He works on farmland but also sells his products in the city.  As a complementary activity, Herder also works for the city and works as a day laborer seeking to increase income to improve his family’s quality of life.  Although some years have been difficult because his land wasn’t very productive, thanks to family support he’s continued forward/.  He also has a business buying and selling livestock and hopes to use extra income from his activities to continue growing and moving his entire family forward.

This is Herder’s first Kiva loan and he’s grateful for the economic support provided and he promises to be punctual with his payments so that he can request another loan later on.  He will use the requested 800 soles to buy organic manure for his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic manure for his crops.

loans.name: Bakht

texts.ru: Бахт является стоматологом. Ему 40 лет. Он женат, имеет троих дочерей и двоих сыновей, и проживает со своей большой семьей в городе Вахдат. У него высшее медицинское образование. В течение 15 лет Бахт работает в стоматологической клинике. Он занимается протезированием зубов и делает это на качественном уровне. У него всегда много пациентов, так как он опытный дантист. Бахт сейчас запрашивает кредит для расширения деятельности. На сумму кредита он хочет закупить золото и изготовить золотые коронки своим пациентам.
texts.en: Bakht is a dentist.  He is 40 years old, married and has three daughters and two sons.  He lives with his large family in the city of Vahdat.  He has a higher medical education.  Bakht has been working in a dental clinic for 15 years.  He is involved in making teeth prosthetics and does so with high quality.  He always has many patients because he is an experienced dentist.  Bakht is requesting this loan to expand his business.  He wants to use this loan to purchase gold and make gold crowns for his patients.

loans.use: to purchase gold for making gold crowns

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. For many years she has been successfully running a general store in her community. She offers various goods for daily use and makes enough to contribute to the family income. She has good communication skills and counts a good client list. 

For the improvement of her business she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages. This will help her to meet the demand of her customers on time. She is in her 7th loan cycle with good repayment history. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Abigaël Group

texts.fr: La cliente Mbombo est leader du groupe de crédit « Abigaël » doyenne, entrepreneur courageuse, expérimentée,   âgée de 57 ans et mère de 4 enfants, parmi les quels certains ont déjà leurs propres foyers. Son conjoint est un chauffeur. La cliente est vendeuse des Chikwange (pattes), un repas purement congolais. Elle commença cette activité avec le fonds reçu de son mari, il y a environ 18 ans. Ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d’acheter  des maniocs (intrant de fabrication de chikwange). La vente en crédit  est un obstacle majeur pour le développement de son activité. Dans le futur, elle souhaite agrandir son entreprise, scolariser ses petits fils. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien en micro crédit aux femmes entrepreneurs.
texts.en:
The client Mbombo is the representative for the Abigaël Group credit association. She is a senior member, a courageous entrepreneur, experienced, 57 years of age, and the mother of four children, some of whom have already founded their own homes. Her husband is a driver.

The client is selling the chikwange (fermented cassava), a purely Congolese meal. She started her business with funds she received from her husband about 18 years ago. This new loan will be used to buy cassava (the essential ingredient for manufacturing chikwange). Selling on credit is a major obstacle to the development of her business. In the future, Mbombo wants to expand her business and educate her grandchildren. She is thankful to Hekima for their micro loan support of women entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy cassava (the essential ingredient for manufacturing chikwange)

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es:
Nelson, de 27 años de edad, habitante de la comarca El Potrillo, soltero, de oficio agricultor. El trabaja desde su niñez junto con su mama y su hermano en las labores del campo, sembrando granos básicos y criando ganado. Actividades que hasta el día de hoy le ha permitido sobrevivir junto con su familia, en ocasiones viaja a Costa Rica a cortar café para conseguir ingresos para invertirlo en el ganado y producción de leche y cuajada.

El está solicitando el crédito para comprar alambres y pagar mano de obra para reparar las cercas de los potreros donde tiene a sus animales. Él se ha propuesto mejorar las condiciones de sus animales y aumentar la producción  de leche para vender.
texts.en:
Nelson, 27, lives in the district of El Potrillo.  He’s single and works in agriculture.  He’s worked since childhood alongside his mother and brother doing field chores, planting basic grains and raising cattle.  These activities have allowed him to this day to survive alongside his family.  He occasionally travels to Costa Rica to work cutting coffee to earn income to invest in cattle and mild and cheese production.

He’s asking for the loan to buy wire and pay labor costs to repair the fences in his pasture land where he keeps his animals.  He’s proposed to improve his animals’ conditions to increase the production of milk to sell.

loans.use: to buy wire and to pay labor costs to repair fences.

loans.name: Claudia Milagros

texts.es: Claudia tiene 30 años , es casada, y vive en su casa propia con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Claudia se dedica a la agricultura junto a su esposo cuida a sus animales y sus sembríos de maíz, plátano, etc. Como una actividad complementaria y para tener más ingresos, Claudia tiene sembríos de fréjol en la huerta de su casa. Ambos negocios ayudan a mejorar su calidad de vida y el de su familia. Gracias a la experiencia que tienen en el rubro pudieron salir adelante, y conseguir una mejor producción. Lo que ahora espera es que le vaya muy bien con su cosecha de maíz, y que pueda vender todo su producto y obtenga buenos ingresos para que inicie una nueva campaña. Este es el primer préstamo con Kiva, agradece de antemano el apoyo económico recibido y promete ser puntual con sus pagos. El monto de S/.700.00, lo invertirá en la compra de abono orgánico para mejorar su producción de maíz.
texts.en: Claudia, 30, is married living in her own house with her husband and two children.  Claudia works in agriculture alongside her husband; she cares for her animals and her corn and banana crops.  As a complementary activity and to earn higher income, Claudia grows broad beans in the yard at home.  Both businesses help her improve her and her family’s quality of life.  Thanks to the experience they have in the line of work, they were able to get ahead and acquire improved production.  What she hopes for now is that she’ll do well in her corn harvest so that she can sell the entire crop and earn good income to start a new growing cycle.  This is her first Kiva loan and she thanks in advance for the economic support received; she promises to be punctual with her payments.  She will use the 700 soles to buy organic manure to improve corn production.

loans.use: to buy organic manure for her corn crop.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 29 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser alegre y amable.  Vive en compañía de su esposo Jhon con quien tiene un hijo de 4 años de edad respectivamente, juntos están instalados en la casa de su suegra. Rosa se dedica a la venta de comidas, actividad que realiza de lunes a viernes desde hace 02 años. Su actividad económica lo realiza en un mercado de la ciudad y le gusta su negocio pues que le va muy bien ya que recibe buenos ingresos de está actividad. Por el contrario no le gusta el cansancio físico que le ocaciona levantarse muy de temprano para preparar las comidas, sin embargo esto no la desanima y continúa en su negocio ya que desea ser mejor cada dia. Este será su segundo préstamo con Kiva y agradece el apoyo financiero recibido para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 1200 nuevos soles comprará ingredientes al por mayor tales como arroz, sacos de papa, verduras , entre otros.
texts.en:
Rosa, 29, is a hardworking, dedicated woman in addition to being cheerful and kind.  She lives with her husband, Jhon, with whom she has a four-year-old son.  They live together in her mother-in-law’s house.  

Rosa works selling food, an activity she’s carried out from Monday through Friday for the last two years.  She carries out her economic activity in a market in the city and she likes her business because she does very well since she earns good income from this activity.  On the other hand, however, she does not like the physical exhaustion caused by having to rise so very early to prepare the meals.  However, this does not discourage her and she continues in business because she wants to be better every day.

This will be her second Kiva loan and she’s grateful for the financial support she’ll get to continue moving forward.  In addition, she commits to make her payments punctually.  She will use the 1,200 new soles to buy ingredients like rice, sacks of potatoes, vegetables, etc. at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Edward

texts.es: Edward tiene 41 años, es casado, y vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa y sus 3 hijos. Edward se dedica a la venta de leña y a la agricultura. Anteriormente trabajaba de peón en las chacras de otras personas, hasta que pudo adquirir un pequeño terreno para sus cultivos. Ahora con esos ahorros a podido comprar un mototaxi con el que puede transportar toda su mercadería. Ahora con los ingresos que obtiene de la venda de leña, espera abrir un nuevo negocio dedicado a la mecánica con su hijo. Este es el primer crédito con Kiva, por lo que agradece el apoyo económico recibido, el cual le ayudará a mejorar su negocio y a dinamizar sus ventas. Edward promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Edward, invertirá los S/. 1000 en la compra de materiales tales como desarmadores, pernos , entre otros,  para así iniciar su nuevo negocio dedicado a la mecánica junto a su hijo.
texts.en:
Edward, 41, is married and lives in his own home with his wife and 3 children. Edward works selling wood and also in farming.

Previously he worked as a day labourer on other people's farms, until he could acquire a small amount of land for his crops. Now, with his savings he has been able to buy a motorcycle taxi, with which he can transport all of his merchandise. Now with the income that he gains from selling firewood, he hopes to open a new mechanic business with his son. 

This is his first Kiva loan and he is very grateful for the economic support he has received, which will help him to improve his business and invigorate his sales. Edward promises to be punctual with his payments. Edward will invest the 1000 PEN by buying materials, such as screwdrivers, bolts and others, so he can start his new mechanic business with his son.

loans.use: to buy materials for his new mechanic business

loans.name: Dúo Marcelina Group

texts.es:
Dúo MARCELINA
este grupo lo integra la señora Rafaila quien se dedica a la confección de blusas de tela, se ve en la necesidad de comprar la tela por libra ya que gastaría menos y le quedaría más ganancia.  Son varios colores los que a ella le hacen falta y pide un crédito para poder comprar la tela que le hace falta y así no quedarles mal sus clientes, ya que tiene varios pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes, espera que le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
MARCELINA DUO

Rafaila is part of this group.  She works making cloth blouses.  She needs to buy fabric by the pound because she’d spend less and earn higher profits.  She needs several colors and is asking for a loan to be able to buy the fabric she needs so that she won’t disappoint her customers since she already has pending orders.  She hopes that she’ll be able to get help with the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make blouses to sell.

location.town: Cantón San Francisco, Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Ped

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
Edith, de 48 años de edad, es divorciada y vive junto a sus dos hijos en su casa propia. Edith se dedica a la venta de ropas de segunda mano para damas, caballeros y niños , los cuales son de diversos modelos y presentaciones, toda la ropa es enviada de otra ciudad buscando lo ultimo de la moda, las ventas las realiza de forma ambulatoria por otras zonas de la ciudad, dejando muchas veces su ventas al crédito, logrando hacerse conocida, lleva 10 años en está actividad. Le gusta su negocio pues se siente independiente contando con un ingreso propio para apoyar a  sus hijos en sus estudios. Este será su primer préstamo con Kiva, por lo tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos y además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado de 500 nuevos soles comprará ropa para damas, caballeros y niños.
texts.en:
Edith, 48, is divorced living with her two children in her own house.  Edith works selling second-hand clothes for women, men and children.  They are of assorted styles and presentations.  All of the clothes are shipped to her from another city.  She always seeks the latest styles and she sells from place to place in other parts of the city.  She often sells on credit and has become well-known; she has ten years’ experience.  She likes the business because she feels independent and has income of her own she can rely on to support her children’s schooling.  

This will be her first Kiva loan and she’s hoping for your support to continue towards her objectives; she commits to make her payments punctually.  She will use the 500 soles requested to buy women’s, men’s and children’s clothes.

loans.use: to buy women's, men's and children's clothes.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José , es un humilde agricultor , que vive en  la comunidad El Bálsamo en las afueras de Boaco, fue beneficiado con su primer crédito Kiva el cual utilizo para darle una mejor asistencia a sus cosechas la cual vendió a precio justo, se siente agradecido por apoyarlo en el momento que más lo necesitaba. 
Hoy está necesitando el crédito para comprar abono y fertilizante para sembrar granos básicos pues desea sacar una producción de calidad que le permita conseguir ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
José is a humble farmer living in the community of El Bálsamo in the outskirts of Boaco.  He was benefited with his first Kiva loan which he used to provide better crop care; he sold his harvest at a fair price and is grateful for the support he got when he most needed it.

Today, he’s asking for a loan to buy manure and fertilizer to plant basic grains because he wants to produce a good crop yield that will lead to income to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Abida

texts.en:
Abida is a 29-year-old, married woman and a mother of six children. She has been running a business of clothing sales. She purchases a variety of clothes from the main city and then sells them to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality clothes in her community. 

She requested a loan of Rs. 35,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a stock of different clothes for the summer season, taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she will be able to earn more income through her greater sales. She is in her fourth loan cycle and hopes to have a good experience with this loan. 

Abida dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of different clothes for the summer season

loans.name: Shameem

texts.en:
Shameem is 47 years old, a married lady, and is running a small general store in her community.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family.

 To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan of Rs 20,000 which she will use to buy rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she will be able to deal with more customers time after time. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates.

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en:
Kousar is a 28-year-old married woman. She is a vigorous lady and, for the past two years, she has been running a business of clothing sales. She buys clothes of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. 

She is requesting a loan of Rs. 25,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of clothes for the summer season in different colors and designs to attract more customers. She is in her 4th loan cycle with good repayment history. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of clothes for the summer season in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Carla

texts.es: Carla, de 39 años de edad, es una mujer muy alegre, dinámica y emprendedora, está casada con Julio quien es mototaxista. Vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 05 hijos en la casa de su madre. El trabajo que realiza Carla es la venta de golosinas, actividad que realiza en la puerta de un Jardín de niños ubicado cerca a su domicilio, la cual  viene funcionando desde hace 06 años, para realizar está actividad cuenta con la ayuda de uno de sus hijos. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite tener un ingreso económico que le permite pagar los gastos de la casa,  y le da tiempo de ver a sus hijos. Este será su tercer préstamo con Kiva y se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante. Con el préstamo de S/.1000 nuevos soles, comprará golosinas en general tales como galletas, caramelos, chocolates, entre otros.
texts.en: Carla, age 39, is a very happy, dynamic, and enterprising woman. She is married to Julio, who drives a mototaxi. She and Julio live together with their five children in Carla's mother's home. Carla sells candy outside of a daycare centre located near her home. She has been doing this for six years, and one of her children helps her with the business. She likes that her job allows her to have an income to cover the household costs and gives her time to see her children. This will be her third loan with Kiva, and she is very grateful for the financial support that she is receiving to move forward with her business. With this loan of 1000 nuevos soles, she will purchase candies such as cookies, caramels, and chocolates.

loans.use: to buy cookies, caramels, chocolates, and other items.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph lives outside of Magodi, in Kwale county. Kwale county is located on the Kenyan coast, and is the southernmost Kenyan county. Though some of the towns along the beach see benefits from tourism, the majority of people living inland are farmers, and the region's inconsistent rains can make agricultural yields unpredictable. Beekeeping is a relatively new activity in the area, but many farmers here are enthusiastic at the prospect of owning their own hives.

Joseph is married and has eight children. His wife is retired, and he farms their plot. He is currently growing oranges and other crops on their land. Joseph is excited to start beekeeping because his bees will pollinate his oranges, leading to higher yields. 

This is Joseph’s first loan, and he plans to use the income generated by his beehives to build a water reservoir on his land. In the future, Joseph hopes to build upon this reservoir, eventually growing it into a large-scale irrigation project.

loans.use: to buy beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is a 35-year-old married woman and a mother of eight children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands including food, health, clothing, and education. She has been doing carpet manufacturing for the last five years. She offers various handmade carpets in different colors and designs. By this time, she has become famous in providing good quality carpets in her area. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

Currently she applied for a  loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase more raw materials such as good quality wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibers to increase her sales. It’s her 3rd year with Kashf Foundation and she has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to purchase more raw materials such as good quality wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibers.

loans.name: Sulma Virginia

texts.es:
Sulma tiene 22 años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña. Ella es consejera de venta de productos cosméticos, donde prácticamente lleva desempeñando el servicio 1 año. Pero antes se dedicaba a la venta de productos cosméticos con diferentes marcas donde trabajo 2 años.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para cubrir algunos gastos del hogar como comprar la leche de su pequeña hija de dos años. El préstamo le ayudara a comprar lo necesario a su hija para que tenga buenas condiciones; ya que su hija apenas tiene 2 años y se requiere de un cuido especial para evitar la desnutrición  y comprarle vitaminas y alimentos para el consumo diario.

Ella desea, seguir trabajando duro para darle lo necesario; ya que ella es una joven soltera y quiere que su hija tenga lo necesario y los cuidados que se merecen los niños.
texts.en:
Sulma is 22 years old; she is a single mother of one daughter. She is a makeup sales consultant, where she has worked for practically one year. But before, she sold cosmetic products from different brands where she worked for two years.

The loan that she is requesting from Kiva partner Fundacion Campo is to cover some household expenses such as buying milk for her little two-year-old daughter. The loan will help her buy what's necessary for her daughter to have good living conditions because her daughter is barely two years old and she need special care to avoid malnutrition, and Sulma buys her vitamins and foods for her daily consumption.

She wants to continue working to give her daughter all that is necessary because she is a single young woman and she wants her daughter to have all she needs and the care that children deserve.

loans.use: cover some household expenses, such as purchasing milk for her small two-year-old daughter.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto es un joven de 28 años, que vive en una comunidad rural de Nicaragua, en una pequeña finca cuya principal actividad económica es el café. Junto a su esposa, con quien tiene un hijo de 7 años que está en Primaria, ha venido mejorando su finca y diversificando con otras actividades como la compra de venta de ganado. El es un joven que logró obtener el bachillerato pero optó por dedicarse a la agricultura desde hace 10 años aproximadamente, lo cual es algo que conoce desde muy pequeño.

Su pequeña finca, está dentro del grupo de fincas de afiliados a PAC (Asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria) que han sido certificadas por Comercio Justo, como productores de café. Para continuar mejorando los procesos de su finca y contar con capital para las actividades de mantenimiento de su cafetal en este ciclo de cosecha 2013-2014, este joven está solicitando un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insumos que contribuyan a los rendimientos y calidad del café que produce.

Su visión por la mejora continua de los procesos que implementa en su finca y su empeño en el trabajo, confía en que le permitirán continuar creciendo y mejorando su pequeña propiedad y su plantación de café.
texts.en:
Gilberto is a young man who is 28 years of age. He lives in a rural community in Nicaragua where he has a small farm. His main business activity is growing coffee. He and his wife have a seven-year-old son who is in primary school. Gilberto has been able to improve his farm and diversify into other activities, such as buying and selling livestock. He was able to earn a high school diploma, but he chose to dedicate himself to agriculture, a line of work that he has been in for approximately 10 years. He has gained knowledge in this trade from a very young age.

Gilberto’s small farm is affiliated with PAC (Association for People in Community Action), which includes certified Fair Trade coffee producers. In order to continue improving the processes on his farm, he needs capital to maintain his production activities for the 2013-2014 crop cycle. Therefore, Gilberto is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of supplies that will contribute to the quantity and quality of coffee that he produces.

His vision is to continue the processes on his farm through his effort and work. He is confident that he can continue growing and improving his small piece of property and his coffee farm.

loans.use: to buy supplies for maintaining his coffee farm.

loans.name: Dúo Señoras De Los Ajvix Group

texts.es:
DÚO SEÑORAS DE LOS AJVIX
Este dúo lo conforma doña María Pilar quien vive en la aldea de Cerro Alto, y tiene 40 años de edad, tiene 7 hijos y 3 de ellos están estudiando y los otros cuatro trabajan, está casada,  tiene una tienda desde hace 4 años donde vende productos comestibles de consumo diario  su negocio está ubicado en su casa, y nos cuenta que está solicitando este crédito para invertirlo en su tienda  ya que quiere empezar a vender algunas verduras porque su tienda está ubicada en el sector en donde hay una escuela y gracias a Dios hay mucha demanda de sus clientes esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles de consumo diario como golosinas,  aguas , y algunas frutas además artículos de consumo diario, espera que se le pueda ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
DÚO SEÑORAS DE LOS AJVIX
This group of two includes María Pilar, who lives in the small town of Cerro Alto. She is 40 and has seven children, three of whom are in school; the other four work. She is married and has had a store in her home for four years where she sells basic staples. She tells us that she is requesting this loan so that she can invest in her store. She wants to start selling some vegetables because her store is located in an area where there is a school, and thanks to God there is a lot of demand. She will use this loan to buy basic everyday staples such as candies, water, fruit, and other items. She hopes that you will be able to help her with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase basic staples.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru: Наталья замужем. Ей 38 лет. Она живет и работает в районе Хуросон. У нее одна дочь в возрасте 15 лет. Наталья отзывчивая и добрая женщина. Она имеет среднее медицинское образование. Её муж таксист, он развозит пассажиров  по нужному маршруту своего района. Наталья имеет аптеку и там она занимается продажей медикаментов. Она фармацевт с богатым опытом. Наталья уже 18 лет работает в этой области. Ей в продвижении деятельности помогает муж и сестра. Наталья берет кредит для закупа медикаментов на продажу с целью увеличения товарооборота. Ее план на будущее - расширение деятельности и открытие еще одной аптеки.
texts.en: Natalya is married.  She is 38 years old.  She lives and works in the Khuroson district.  She has one 15 year-old daughter.  Natalya is a responsive and kind woman.  She has a secondary medical education.  Her husband is a taxi driver, who transports passengers along a necessary route in his district.  Natalya has a pharmacy, where she is involved in selling medicine.  She is a pharmacist with a rich experience.  Natalya has been working in this field for 18 years.  Her husband and sister help her with running this business.  Natalya is requesting this loan to purchase medicine for sale in order to increase goods turnover.  Her plan for the future is an expansion of the business and opening another pharmacy.

loans.use: to purchase medicine for sale in order to increase goods turnover

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en:
Nargis is 39 years old and a married woman. She has been  providing beauty parlor services to the people of her community for many years. She offers many facilities to her customers such as make-up, hair styling and facials.  Over the time she has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to the family income. 

She needs to attract more customers time after time and for this, she requires hair care products and skin products as well as some packs of hair rollers so she applied for a loan of Rs. 10,000 through Kashf Foundation. She is very experienced in her business and confident that her business will move in a positive direction as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy hair care products and skin products and some packs of hair rollers.

loans.name: Zarqa

texts.en:
Zarqa is a 26-year-old married lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demand of her customers. 

For this reason she requested a loan of Rs 30,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of thread in different colors, with packs of laces, zippers and buttons, to create a means of increasing revenues so she may able to generate a healthier source of income. She is in her 4th loan cycle with good repayment history. She dreams of providing a better standard of living to her four children.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors as well as packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase certified potato seeds, compost, and fertilizer for planting.

loans.name: Baraka Alanine Group

texts.fr: La cliente Munguiko est conseillère du groupe d’affaire Baraka alanine,  jeune entrepreneur expérimentée, âgée de 31 ans, mariée et mère de 8 enfants qui étudient tous. Son conjoint est un cambiste. La cliente est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires (arachides et chikwange). Elle installe ses produits au marché. Elle fut initiée par dans cette activité par sa mère, il y environ 15 ans. Ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d’acheter 3 sacs d’arachides, 2 sacs de maniocs, etc. Ainsi, elle souhaite accroitre son capital, scolariser ses enfants et construire. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour son soutien en microcrédit aux petits entrepreneurs.
texts.en:
This client, Munguiko, is the advisor of the business group "Baraka alanine". A young and experienced entrepreneur, she is 31 years old, married, and the mother of eight children, all students. Her husband is a currency exchange agent. This client sells foodstuff, such as peanuts and 'chikwange' (a kind of cassava pasta or dumpling). She sets up her products at the market. She was introduced to this business by her mother about fifteen years ago. She sets up her products at the market. She was introduced to this business by her mother about fifteen years ago. 

This new loan is going to be used to purchase 3 sacks of peanuts, 2 sacks of cassava, etc. Thus, she would like to increase her capital, provide schooling for her children, and build [a house]. So, she thanks Hekima very much for its micro-credit support of small-scale entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts, cassava, etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Cristina

texts.pt:
Cristina de 37 anos de idade, é casada e tem 2 filhos com idade escolar. Ela é assistente administrativa há mais de 5 anos. O esposo é motorista há 4 anos e ambos tem o mesmo horário de trabalho das 07:00h as 15:30h. Sustentam também uma sobrinha que vive com eles. 

O empréstimo será aplicado na compra de areia, cimento, varões e blocos para concluir a sua casa. 

A Cristina tem como esperança dar continuidade aos seus estudos, fazendo o ensino médio e mais tarde ingressando no ensino superior. O seu principal desafio é concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família e dar acompanhamento aos estudos dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
Cristina, 37 years old, is married and has two school-aged children. She has been an administrative assistant for more than five years. Her husband has been a driver for four years, and they have the same work schedule: from 7 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. They also support a niece who lives with them.
This loan will used to buy sand, cement, rebar, and cinder blocks to finish her house.
Cristina hopes to continue her studying, completing secondary school and later entering university. Her main challenges are to finish her house so she can offer her family greater comfort and to accompany her two children in their studies.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, rebar, and cinder blocks to finish construction on her house.

loans.name: Dúo Luz En Mi Camino Group

texts.es:
DÚO LUZ EN MI CAMINO
A cargo de este grupo está la señora María Martina quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, y como actividad secundaria se dedica a la elaboración de refacciones como los tamales.  Ella tiene varios pedidos de cosméticos pero el dinero que tiene no le alcanza y no quiere quedarles mal a sus clientes que le han hecho esos pedidos.  Por  tal razón ella se ve en la necesidad de pedir un nuevo crédito para poder comprar el producto que le hace falta y darles a sus clientes lo que les hace falta, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de cosméticos para la venta.
texts.en:
DÚO LUZ EN MI CAMINO

In charge of this group is Maria Martina who sells cosmetics, and as a secondary business, makes snacks such as tamales. She has several cosmetics orders, but the money that she has is not enough, and she doesn't want to upset her customers who made the orders. Because of this, she sees the need to ask for a new loan to be able to purchase products that she doesn't have and give them to her customers who don't have them yet. She is requesting this loan to purchase cosmetics to sell.

loans.use: purchase cosmetics to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Lidia

texts.pt:
Lidia de 45 anos de idade, é viuva e tem 1 filho com 19 anos de idade que está a estudar. Ela é empregada domestica há mais de 6 anos. O seu horário de trabalho é das 08:00h as 17:00h. Sustenta também uma sobrinha que vive com eles. 


A Lídia tem também um negócio de compra e venda de frangos. O empréstimo será aplicado na compra de frangos para vender numa banca fixa e assim reforçar o seu negocio.

A Lidia tem como esperança ver o seu filho concluindo o ensino superior e entrar no mercado de emprego. O seu principal desejo e de construir umas casas anexas à sua casa para dar de aluguer e assim aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
Lidia, 45 years old, is a widow and has one 19-year-old son who is studying. She has been a domestic employee for more than six years. She works from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. She also supports a niece who lives with her.
Lidia also has a business buying and selling chickens. She will use this loan to buy chickens to sell at a fixed price and thus strengthen her business.
Lidia hopes to see her son finish university and enter the job market. Her main desire is to build some other houses adjacent to her own to rent out and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy chickens to sell.

loans.name: Aurora

texts.pt:
Aurora é separada, estudou até à oitava classe e vive na casa própria. Tem 7 filhos, dois dos quais frequentam o nível superior; dois frequentam a sétima e décima classes respectivamente e os outros filhos já pararam com os estudos.
	Aurora tem um negócio de venda de produtos alimentares. Alguns produtos vende num estabelecimento em sua casa e os mais populares, como milho, vai entregar directamente a casa dos seus clientes e cobra os valores no final do mês. O dinheiro do empréstimo será aplicado na compra de produtos alimentares como: peixe, farinha, arroz e caldo.
	Futuramente diz que pretende comprar uma camioneta para transporte de mercadorias visto que paga valores altos para transportar os seus produtos desde o local onde os compra e por consequência tem tido baixos lucros. Isto permitiria ampliar o seu negócio para isso irá pedir mais empréstimos na Hluvuku.
texts.en: Aurora is divorced. She finished the eighth grade and lives in her own home. She has seven children, two of whom are in university and two of whom are in high school; the rest of them have already completed their studies. Aurora has a business selling groceries. She sells some out of her home, and the most popular products, such as corn, she delivers directly to her clients' houses and collects the payments at the end of the month. She will use this loan to buy food products such as fish, flour, rice, and stock. In the future she would like to buy a truck to transport merchandise, since she pays a lot of money to transport products from the place where she buys them and therefore makes low profits. This would allow her to expand her business and request further loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy food products such as fish, flour, rice, and stock to sell in her home business.

loans.name: Esperança

texts.pt:
Esperança tem 1 filho, é viúva, vive com uma sobrinha e ajuda a sua mãe que vive em Chimoio, enviando-lhe dinheiro mensalmente. É técnica de contabilidade afecta na cidade de Maputo e trabalha das 07:30 até 15:30 horas.
	Além do seu trabalho, ela tem também um negócio de revenda de produtos alimentares através de entregas na casa dos seus clientes e cobrança no final do mês. O dinheiro do empréstimo será aplicado na compra de produtos para o seu negócio como feijão, arroz e peixe.
	A Esperança diz que sonha em ter um estabelecimento comercial como forma de garantir o crescimento do seu negócio e para isso irá pedir mais empréstimos. O principal desafio é manter o seu negócio.
texts.en: Esperança has one son. She is a widow and lives with a niece; she also supports her mother, who lives in Chimoio, sending her money every month. She is an accountant in Maputo and works from 7:30 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. In addition to her work, she also has a business selling groceries. She makes home deliveries to her customers and charges them at the end of the month. The loan will be used to buy products for her business such as beans, rice, and fish. Esperança says that she dreams of having a commercial establishment as a way to expand her business, which is why she is requesting loans. Her main challenge is to keep her business going.

loans.use: to buy products for her business such as beans, rice, and fish.

loans.name: Decontee

texts.en:
Decontee is a 38-year-old businesswoman from Liberia.  She is married and has three children, between 12 and 3.  They are currently attending school and live at home.  She was unfortunate and did not attend school so decided to run a business.  She describes herself as a hard-working woman.

She lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County, located by the sea.  It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish.  Many logging companies are also based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating 'fufu', a cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Decontee has a table business where she has been selling peppers, rice, Vita, salt, onions, etc for the past three years.  She works from 7am to 6pm every day at her business.  Her greatest challenge in business is too little income. She intends to use the loan to buy more peppers, rice, Vita, salt, onions, etc for her business. She started her business by selling for her mother.  She likes her business because it helps to support her home.  She hopes to one day to own a house.  

She wants to thank Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to buy more peppers, rice, Vita, salt, onions, etc for her business.

loans.name: Marie Claire

texts.fr: Marie Claire est une femme de 55ans divorcée mère d'un enfant agé de 29 ans qui va toujours à l'école. Elle a cinq autres personnes à sa charge (petits fils et neuveux). Elle vend des fruits et vivres frais ( piments, plantains, maïs...etc) depuis 21 ans à un marché de la place. Elle achète en petite quantité pour revendre et aimerai avec ce crédit augmenter le stock de de ses marchandises.  Ce qui lui permettre de vendre plus de d'augmenter de bénéfice, profit qu'elle économisera  pour la scolarisation de ses petits fils et agrandir son activité dans le temps.
texts.en: Marie Claire is a 55-year-old woman who is divorced and the mother of a 29-year-old child, who is still in school. Marie Claire has five other persons to support (grandchildren and nephews). She has been selling fruit and fresh staple foods (chili peppers, plantains, corn, etc…) for 21 years at a local market. She makes her purchases in small amounts and then resells the goods. She would like to use this loan to increase her inventory of goods. This will enable her to sell more and increase her profit, which she will save to provide schooling to her grandchildren and to expand her business over time.

loans.use: to buy fruit and staple foods wholesale

loans.name: Edgar Eulogio

texts.es:
Edgar es un hombre de 38 años, aprendió a trabajar desde que era niño, pues los recursos de su familia eran limitados y él no pudo continuar sus estudios después de la primaria. Hace algunos años decidió unirse con su pareja Gloria que tiene 33 años y es ayudante de cocina en un restaurant, con esta mujer Edgar ha formado un hogar con cuatro hijos preciosos quienes estudian en la escuela pública y Edgar espera darles la oportunidad que él no tuvo de culminar sus estudios hasta que sean profesionales. Edgar vive con su familia en la Parroquia de Río Verde de Santo Domingo, la capital de la Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, una provincia de Ecuador que en los últimos años ha tenido un alto crecimiento sostenido. Su capital  es una ciudad en donde lo más atractivo y llamativo son sus deliciosas frutas, y la gastronomía que ofrecen en el lugar. También cuenta con un comercio considerable  ya que se ha convertido en un puerto terrestre de intercambio comercial entre las regiones Sierra y Costa del país. Además cuenta con varios atractivos turísticos que acompañados de su clima cálido son muy concurridos por turistas nacionales y extranjeros. Es por esto que la mayoría de sus habitantes han emprendido con alguna actividad comercial o de servicios para habitantes y turistas.
Edgar trabaja independientemente desde hace 4 años en la crianza de cerdos para su posterior comercialización, empezó a trabajar en esta labor para conseguir ingresos adicionales a su trabajo, ahora se dedica más tiempo, sin embargo, es un negocio que está saturado ya que muchos habitantes de la zona se dedican a la venta de animales, pero Edgar tiene clientes que le buscan por el buen cuidado que le da a los animales y los precios justos a los que vende. En una anterior ocasión Edgar formó parte de un grupo con el que obtuvieron un crédito en Fundación Alternativa, en esta ocasión solicita un préstamo de forma independiente que lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos y también pollos para así incrementar su negocio y obtener mejores utilidades que le permitan brindar a su familia un mejor estilo de vida. Edgar afirma que la primera vez que trabajó con Fundación Alternativa sintió mucha seguridad y se sintió respaldado por la institución a través de la asesoría de su ejecutivo de cuenta que le ha ayudado mucho con consejos de cómo administrar su negocio.
texts.en:
Edgar, 38, learned to work when he was a child as his family had limited resources and he could not continue his education after primary school. A few years ago he decided to marry his partner Gloria, a 33 year old kitchen assistant. With this woman, Edgar has created a home with four children who are all studying at the public school and Edgar hopes to give them the opportunities that he never had to study until they are professionals. 

Edgar and his family live in the Río Verde de Santo Domingo parish, the capital of the Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas province. A province of Ecuador that in recent years has sustained a high level of growth. Its capital is a city that names delicious fruits and gastronomy as its most attractive and appealing offerings. It also counts on a considerable commerce as it has become a gateway of commercial exchange between the desert and coastal regions of the country. It also counts on various tourist attractions that along with the warn climate mean it is often frequented by domestic and foreign tourists. It is for this reason that the majority of its residents have set up some kind of commercial activity or service for residents and tourists.

Edgar has been working independently for 4 years, growing pigs and later selling them. He started working in this trade to earn supplementary income for his work. Now he dedicates more time to it, however, it is a business that is saturated as many residents in the area sell animals for a living. Edgar has customers who look for him as he gives good care to the animals and sells them for a fair price.

Previously, Edgar was part of a group that obtained a loan from Fundación Alternativa, on this occasion he is requesting a loan independently to buy pigs and chickens so that he can grow his business and earn better profits to allow him to give his family a better quality of life. Edgar asserts that the first time he worked with Fundación Alternativa, he felt much safer and felt supported and by the institution through the consultant in charge of their account who gave him lots of advice on how to run his business.

loans.use: to buy pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Orlieta

texts.pt:
Orlieta tem 30 anos e vive na casa própria com o marido e 3 filhos (2 deles vão à escola e a outra não tem ainda idade escolar).
	A Orlieta e o seu marido têm um estabelecimento de venda de produtos alimentares de primeira necessidade em sua casa, onde trabalham quase todo o dia. O dinheiro do empréstimo será aplicado no seu negócio comprando produtos como farinha de milho, açúcar e bolachas para revenda.
	Orlieta sempre teve sonho de aumentar o volume do seu negócio e procurar um espaço para construir uma moradia para os seus filhos. O desafio principal é continuar com o seu negócio e concluir a ampliação da sua casa.
texts.en: Orlieta is 30 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three childre (two of whom are in school and one of whom is still too young to study). Orlieta and her husband have a business selling staple groceries in their home, where they work most of the day. They will use this loan to buy products for their business such as corn flour, sugar, and crackers. Orlieta has always dreamed of expanding their business and finding a space to build a house for their children. Her greatest challenges are to keep her business going and finish expanding her house.

loans.use: to buy products for her business such as corn flour, sugar, and crackers.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.pt:
A D. Lúcia de 46 anos de idade, é viúva e tem 4 (quatro) filhos, dos quais 3 (três) são maiores de idade e uma é menor de idade estando a frequentar o ensino primário.
Ela è negociante e vende refeições e bebidas na sua própria casa. O presente empréstimo será aplicado na compra de mercadoria (frangos, peixe, arroz, cerveja e refrigerantes) para reforçar o volume do seu negócio. A D. Lúcia já faz esta actividade há muito tempo e a maioria dos seus clientes são camionistas que viajam frequentemente desde a África do Sul e fazem encomendas das suas refeições.
Tem como esperança aumentar o volume do seu negócio e melhorar as condições da vida.
texts.en:
46-year-old Lúcia is a widow and has four children. Three of children are adults and the other one is an underage daughter who attends elementary school.
She's a merchant who sells meals and beverages from her own home. The current loan will be used to purchase merchandise (chickens, fish, rice, beer and sof drinks) in order to boost her business. Lúcia has been in this line of work for a long time. Most of her customers are truck drivers who travel from South Africa on a regular basis and order her meals.
She hopes to boost her business and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (chickens, fish, rice, beer and soft drinks) in order to boost her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a zero grazing unit.

loans.name: Uaminifu Rénové Group

texts.fr: La cliente Vambesa est leader du groupe de crédit « Uaminifu Rénové » entrepreneur  talentueuse,  âgée de 46 ans et mère de 6 enfants, qui étudient tous. Son conjoint est un fonctionnaire de l’administration publiquetiers. La cliente exerce des petits métiers d’artisanat (broderie). Elle commença cette activité avec le fonds reçu de son mari, il y a environ 13 ans. Ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d’acheter  des matériels de broderie. Dans le futur, elle souhaite agrandir son entreprise en ouvrant un atelier dans le centre ville, scolariser, nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien en micro crédit aux femmes entrepreneurs.Il sied de signaler que certaines clientes portent leurs bébés.
texts.en:
This client, Vambesa, is the leader of the loan group "Uaminifu Rénové". A talented entrepreneur, she is 46 years old and the mother of six children, all students. Her husband is a civil servant. This client works in the small artisanal trades (embroidery). She started this business with funds from her husband about thirteen years ago. This new loan will be used to purchase some supplies and equipment for embroidery. 

For the future, she would like to expand her enterprise by opening a workshop downtown and  to provide schooling and food for her children. So, she thanks Hekima for its micro-credit support of women entrepreneurs. It should be noted that certain clients in the photo are carrying their babies.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for embroidery

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Buena Vista Group

texts.es:
Las señora Margarita es madre soltera, tiene 43 años de edad, cursó 2 años de educación primaria tiene 6 hijos y 2 de ellos estan estudiando, ella se dedica a tejer guipiles y cortes típicos, inició este negocio por la enseñanza de su madre y hasta la fecha lleva 30 años de experiencia en ese ramo.

Ella decide organizar un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de hilos para tejer guipiles y cortes, en el futuro desea tener más capital para poder producir más y poder vender en otros lugares; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a tejer guiplies y cortes típicos. En la fotografia aparecen 7 integrantes pero, solo se les concedió el préstamo a 5 de ellas.
texts.en:
Margarita is a single mother, 43 years old, completed two years of primary school, and has six children, two of of whom are in school. She weaves guipiles (regional clothing of the indigenous people) and traditional clothing. She started this business that her mother taught her, and to date, has 30 years of experience in this field.

She decided to organize a group and request a loan that she will use to purchase threads for weaving the guipiles and traditional clothes. In the future she wants to have more capital to be able to produce more and be able to sell in other places. The other group members weave guipiles and traditional clothes. In the photo, there are seven members, but only five of them took the loan.

loans.use: purchase threads for weaving.

loans.name: Inzan

texts.fr:
Né en Décembre 1972 à Kolondièba (Préfecture  de la 3ème Région administrative du Mali), INZAN réside à Kolondièba ville avec ses 8 enfants et ses femmes dans une famille traditionnelle.
 Monsieur INZAN s’est vite intéressé aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat vente de carburant et des pièces détachées (auto- moto) depuis  maintenant 6 ans. Il est très apprécié et sollicité au marché et surtout les jours de foire. 
INZAN collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  quatrième prêt, après avoir correctement remboursé les précédents. 
INZAN compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 5 fûts  de carburant. Il s’approvisionne à Koumantou. Il effectue ses ventes au comptant et en détail dans ses points de vente à une clientèle  composée d’hommes et de femmes.
INZAN espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 95.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en:
Born in December 1972 in Kolondièba (prefecture of the third administrative region of Mali), Inzan lives in Kolondièba town with his eight children and his wives in a traditional family unit. 

 Monsieur INZAN became interested early on in income-earning activities, notably, the sale of fuel and spare parts (for cars and motorcycles) which he has been doing for six years now. He has a good reputation and is sought after at the market and especially on fair days. 

Inzan has been working together with Soro Yiriwaso to increase his working capital so that he can satisfy his ever-growing clientele. He is on his fourth loan after having correctly reimbursed the preceding ones. 

Inzan intends to use his loan to buy five barrels of fuel. He buys his stock in  Koumantou. He makes his sales for cash, retail, at his various sales locations to a clientele composed of men and women. 

Inzan hopes to make a monthly profit of 95,000 F CFA which will be used to cover family expenses, reimburse the loan, and invest in his businesses.

loans.use: to buy fuel

loans.name: Bernadette

texts.fr: Bernadette est une femme de 58 ans veuve, mère de 07 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 6 et 24 ans, quatre vont encore à l'école. Elle est commerçante depuis 11 ans dans une gare ou elle vend du bois. Ayant contacté un crédit il ya un an, son activité a un peu progressé. Elle voudrait bien contracter un nouveau qui puisse l'aider dans la même logique. En fait, elle aimerait résoudre un problème de rupture de stock auquel elle est confrontée Ceci l'aidera à péréniser son activité et à nourrir sa famille de même que économiser pour les rentrées scolaires.
texts.en: Bernadette is a 58-year-old woman, a widow, and the mother of seven children, from 6 to 24 years old, of whom four are still in school. Bernadette has been a merchant for eleven years at a station where she sells lumber. Having had a loan a year ago, her business has progressed a little. She would like to have a new loan that may help her in the same way. In fact, she would like to resolve an inventory shortage she is faced with. This loan will help make her business sustainable and feed her family, as well as save money for the back-to-school season.

loans.use: to diversify her merchandise

loans.name: Carlos  Alfredo

texts.es: Carlos de 43 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su esposa, es empleado trabaja de administrador en una empresa que está cerca de su lugar de residencia  tiene varios años de trabajar en esa actividad con el pago que recibe logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, carlos esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de una turbo cocina ecológica ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder comprarla.
texts.en:
Carlos, 43, lives in a relative’s house with his wife. He is employed as an administrator at a company that is close to his place of residence. He has worked at that job for many years. With the pay he receives, he manages to cover some household expenses.

Carlos is requesting a loan for the purchase of an environmentally-friendly turbo-cooker because he can’t afford to buy it with what he earns.

loans.use: to buy an environmentally-friendly turbo-cooker.

loans.name: Bineta's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de 6 femmes qui habitent le même village et font toutes le commerce. Il est a son 10éme prêt. Bineta est la représentante du groupe,elle est âgé de 43 ans ,mariée et mère de 3 filles de (16,12,9 ans) et 5 garçons de (21,18,15,11,et 4 ans). Elle  fait du commerce de Crustacés. elle attend sur le quai l'arrivé des pirogues qui revient de pèche et achète tout leur arrivage et après elle vend en séchant une partie et l'autre au frais.Avec son prêt elle compte acheter 5 pirogues de 100kg de Crustacés a 100000f chacun .Les bénéfices réalisés lui permettent de prendre en charge les besoins alimentaires , sanitaires et scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en: This group is composed of six women who live in the same village. They all work in commerce. They are on their tenth loan. Bineta is the group's representative. She is 43 years old, married, and the mother of three girls (16, 12, and 9 years old) and five boys (21, 18, 15, 11, and 4 years old). She does commerce in shellfish. She waits at the wharf for the boats to arrive back from fishing, and she purchases their entire load. Later, she sells some of the goods dried and some of them fresh. With her loan, she intends to purchase 5 boats of 100 kg of shellfish at 100,000 francs each. The profits generated enable her to provide for her children in terms of food, healthcare, and schooling.

loans.use: to purchase shellfish to sell

loans.name: Dolores Santos

texts.es:
Dolores tiene 40 años de edad, esta casado y tiene tres hijos. Se dedica a la prestación de sus servicios en la alcaldía municipal como albañil. Oficio que aprendió hace 25 años; es decir desde que tenia 15 años de edad, conocimiento que adquirió a través de su padre;  ya que su padre es albañil y lo guío a aprender el oficio comenzando como ayudante de albañil y ahorra es un experto en la actividad.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 1 corta frío para cortar hierro,1 pulidora para cortar hierro, 1 pulidora para cortar madera, 1 torno, 1 juego de brocas, 1 trasformador para soldadura, .2 cucharas , 2 mordazas, 1 tenaza, 1 martillo de hule, etc., todas aquellas herramientas necesarias para realizar su trabajo. De esta manera, poseerá las herramientas necesarias y en buen estado para desempeñar mejor su trabajo; ya que no dispone de todas las herramientas para realizar las actividades como albañil, pero que con el apoyo del crédito tendrá mejores ingresos al no tener atrasos en su trabajo. Se le presentaran mayores oportunidades de trabajo ya que contara con lo básico para desempeñar su trabajo.

Planea seguir trabajando como albañil; ya sea por cuenta propia o por contrato como lo esta realizando en estos momentos lo cual a sido su principal fuente de ingresos para  sacar a su familia adelante y darle la oportunidad de estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Dolores, 40, is married and has three children. He offers his services as a bricklayer through the municipal council. He learnt this trade 25 years ago, when he was 15 years old. He learnt the trade from his father, as his father is a bricklayer and guided him to start the job beginning as an apprentice and now he is an expert in the trade.

He is asking Fundación Campo for the loan so he can buy a cold cutter to cut iron, a metal sander, a wood sander, a lathe, a set of drill bits, a transformer for the soldering iron, 2 knives, 2 clamps, a set of pliers, a rubber hammer, etc., all of which are tools he needs for his job. This will allow him to have all the tools he needs and will be in a better position to do his job. Currently, he does not have all the tools he needs to work as a bricklayer, but with the support of the loan he will have better income and will not have delays in his work. Better work opportunities will be available to him as he will be able to rely on the basic tools he needs to carry out his work.

He plans to keep working as a bricklayer, be it as a freelancer or on contract as he is working at the moment and which has been his primary source of income to help his family to succeed and provide his children with the opportunity to be educated.

loans.use: to buy a cold cutter to cut iron, a metal sander, a wood sander, a lathe, a set of drill bits, a transformer for the soldering iron, 2 knives, 2 clamps, a set of pliers, a rubber hammer, etc., all of which are tools he needs for his job.

loans.name: María Ruth

texts.es: Sandra de 31 años de edad es una mujer que desde su adolescencia se apasionó por los negocios, cuenta que cuando estudiaba en el colegio era la vendedora de dulces de la clase. Siempre soñó con tener su propio negocio pero no contaba con los recursos para su proyecto, por lo cual al terminar sus estudios de bachillerato se empleó en el sector de confección, allí laboró por varios años y luego renunció cansada de la explotación que recibía por parte de sus superiores. Con la liquidación comenzó vendiendo ropa a sus familiares y vecinos y luego con la rentabilidad del negocio decidió colocar un local. En la actualidad ofrece servicio de papelería, helados y venta de ropa. Su mayor deseo es acreditar su negocio, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que comprará artículos escolares para la temporada de principio de año.
texts.en: Sandra, 31 years old, is a woman who, since adolescence, has been passionate for business. She says that when she was in college, she sold sweets to the class. She always dreamed of having her own business, but she didn't have the resources for her project. Because of this, when she finished her bachelor's degree, she started working in the confectionery sector. She worked there for several years and later quit, tired of being exploited by her superiors. With the settlement, she started selling clothes to her family members and neighbors, and later, because of the profitability of the business, decided to open a shop. Now she offers stationery services, ice cream, and clothing sales. Her biggest wish is to solidify her business, which is why she is requesting a loan that she will use to purchase school supplies for the start of the year.

loans.use: purchase ingredients for preparing meals.

loans.name: Simiao

texts.pt:
O Sr Simiao de 57 anos de idade, casado, vive na sua própria casa e tem 6 filhos, todos maiores de idade e independentes. Ele è operário agrícola.
O Presente empréstimo sera aplicado na compra de material de construção (cimento, ferro, porta, barrotes e pagamento de mão-de-obra) para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa.
O Sr Simiao alem de ser operário agrícola è Agricultor na sua própria machamba, na qual produz feijão para trazer um rendimento extra para a sua família.
texts.en:
Simiao is 57 years old and married. He lives in a house that he owns and he has six children, all of whom are adults and independent. He's a farm worker.
The current loan will be used to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, a door and beams) and to pay for labor in order to continue building his house.
Aside from being a farm worker, Simiao is also a farmer on his own land. There he grows beans so that he can bring extra income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, a door and beams) and to pay for labor in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
A D. Teresa de 33 anos de idade, casada, vive na sua própria casa e tem 04 ( quatro ) filhos dos quais 3 (tres ) frequentam a escola no ensino primário e outro filho não tem idade de frequentar a escola.
Ela è negociante de roupa e tem um estabelecimento localizado no Mercado. O presente empréstimo será aplicado na compra de mercadoria (Calcas, Camisas e chinelos) para aumentar o volume de mercadoria para venda.
A D.Teresa pretende adquirir um congelador para armazenar refrigerantes e outras bebidas para revenda e para assim ampliar o volume do seu negócio e poder sustentar a sua família.
texts.en:
33-year-old Teresa is married and lives in a house that she owns. She has four children, three of whom attend elementary school and the other son is too young to attend school.
